theme.title: Triplet tied to next note
theme.para: In this lesson two new rhythmic patterns are introduced. They are the result of tying a triplet to the next note:

score.music: (score (vers 1.6) (instrument (musicData (time 2 4 noVisible) (n * e g+ t3)(n * e)(n * e g- t- l)(n * q)(barline) (n * e g+ t3)(n * e)(n * e g- t- l)(n * e g+)(n * e g-)(barline end) )))

part.title: Listen and take notice of the differences
part.para: Note the difference between the first and the second measure, and between the third and the fourth ones. Note how measures 2 and 4 are similar to measures 1 and 3 but tying the triplets.

score.music: (score (vers 1.6) (instrument (musicData (clef G)(key C)(time 2 4) (n a4 e g+ t3)(n a4 e)(n a4 e g- t-)(n a4 q)(barline) (n a4 e g+ t3)(n a4 e)(n a4 e g- t- l)(n a4 q)(barline) (n a4 e g+ t3)(n a4 e)(n a4 e g- t-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-)(barline) (n a4 e g+ t3)(n a4 e)(n a4 e l g- t-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-)(barline end) )))

part.title: Exercises
part.para: Exercise 1 - Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.
Exercise 2 - Read scores containing the rhythms studied in this lesson.
